note:
Experienced Senior Editor with a demonstrated history of working in the media production industry. Skilled in Television Channel Management, Politics, Web Content Writing, Storytelling, News Writing, and Editing.
25 years of experience in both print and visual media.
Started career with Malayala Manorama and later held senior positions in channels like Jaihind, Indiavision and News 18. Active in Journalist fraternity and held positions like Secretary of Thiruvananthapuram Press Club.
